'''Beta 1.6.4''' is a version of [[Java Edition Beta]] released on May 26, 2011,<ref>{{twon|5865441538|Minecraft Beta 1.6.4|May 26, 2011}}</ref> to fix a CPU load issue in [[Beta 1.6.3]].

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Attempted to fix CPU usage issue on [[singleplayer]] and [[multiplayer]].
